trans-unit.source: Implements the <c>GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly</c> task.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <c>GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly</c> 工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 請使用專案檔中的 <c>GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly</c> 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly](/visualstudio/msbuild/generatetemporarytargetassembly-task).
trans-unit.target: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly](/visualstudio/msbuild/generatetemporarytargetassembly-task)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對專案產生之組件的簡短名稱，這也是暫時產生之目標組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.
trans-unit.target: 為專案產生之組件的簡短名稱，這也是暫時產生之目標組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 MS Build 目標名稱，用來從原始程式碼檔中產生組件。

trans-unit.source: The MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.
trans-unit.target: MS Build 目標名稱，用來從原始程式碼檔中產生組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Managed 編譯器工作可接受的適當項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: Managed 編譯器工作可接受的適當項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the full path of current project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前專案檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: The full path of current project file.
trans-unit.target: 目前專案檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: Executes a task.
trans-unit.target: 執行工作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作執行成功則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of generated code files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所產生之程式碼檔案的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of generated code files.
trans-unit.target: 產生的程式碼檔案的清單。

trans-unit.source: This can have 0 items.
trans-unit.target: 這可以有 0 個項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定暫存目標組件將在哪一個目錄中產生。

trans-unit.source: The directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.
trans-unit.target: 暫存目標組件將在其中產生的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MS Build binary path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 MS Build 二進位路徑。

trans-unit.source: The MS Build binary path.
trans-unit.target: MS 組建二進位路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of resolved reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已解析參考組件的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of resolved reference assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 已解析之參考組件的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來保留 Managed 編譯器工作中之參考清單的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.
trans-unit.target: 用來保留 Managed 編譯器工作中之參考清單的項目名稱。
